lender.name: Empress
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have many opportunities presented to me as a female entrepeneur in the music industry. Its hard getting started with any business and its even harder to maintain when your working as a product, and maintaining a family on your own. I am a single mother that doesn't beleive that when the going gets tough you quit. You just become wiser and resourceful. I loan because I want to give others the opportunity that I have been given. Give them the drop of hope that have recieved. So I Smile and Pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I am a female in a male-dominated industry. I have been a radio personality for over 5 years now and I have been a DJ spinning music at parties for 10 years. My work can be very hard sometimes because there is a lot of doubt associated with hiring a female entertainer. However, that challenge is what makes me work harder. My job has more benefits than negatives because I am able to help the people that listen to my shows and watch me perform at parties, relax and let go of the everyday stresses for the moment. The best part of the job is being able to help those new artist that have a dream of making it to the top. They have so many different stories and reasons to become stars. Mainly because they have families that they are trying to take care of. So, my job is somewhat like a musical doctor/teacher. I heal, guide, direct, soothe and create.

lender.occupational_info: I manage dwellings for investors who own them. My company finds a tenant to lease the dwelling, we collect rent, we keep 10% of the money we collect and we send the rest to the investor. We must select good tenants or else we don't get paid. We must also answer to the investor and account for all funds. We also make repairs to the dwellings when there are problems.

lender.name: Morgan & Ed
lender.loan_because: Everybody has a story to tell; a micro loan helps support someone, and this small gift makes us feel connected to sisters and brothers on the planet. Hang in there, entrepreneurs--we respect what you are able to do, how hard you work to make a difference and to provide for family and community. We are all the same in our capacity to hope and dream, and then to act to make it real.
lender.occupational_info: Morgan writes fiction and nonfiction. We are entrepreneurs who help people with disabilities--especially people who are blind, low vision, or who find it difficult to read or use a computer. Our company Virtual Vision Technologies, supports employers and educators in hiring and teaching people with disabilities. Our Learning Center staff help people master the use of "talking" and print magnification Assistive Technology software and hardware so they can read and /or operate a standard Windows computer for work or school. We work with international corporations to help them hire, train, and promote people with disabilities.

lender.name: bnb
lender.loan_because: New Jersey laser hair removal, chemical peel treatment, smart lipo treatment, laser vein treatment, velashape procedure are some of the most advanced medical technologies offered by Medispa. Avail 50% off on any laser treatment in Shrewsbury, Monmouth regions of NJ.
lender.occupational_info: If you think applying acid on the face to look young and pretty sounds crazy then maybe you have not heard about the chemical peel treatment Monmouth. Before you rush to use acid lying around the house as a face wash let me inform you that only a few acids like glycolic, lactic, salicylic, and kojic acids in the hands of master esthetician at The Medispa at Shrewsbury are capable of improving the health of your skin and make you look younger. Chemical peel treatment at Monmouth replaces the wrinkled, blemished, unevenly pigmented skin with a smoother, tighter, younger-looking skin in a completely non-invasive manner. But if you are incapable of overcoming your deep rooted fear of acids, and yet long for the flawless young looking skin, then IPL treatment is just the thing for you. Short form of Intense Pulsed Light, IPL is also known as photofacial. IPL treatment New Jersey, makes use of light waves of various wavelengths to work beneath the skin‚Äôs surface to reduce brown spots, enlarged pores, discoloration, redness and broken capillaries for a more homogenous appearance. You would need 3 to 6 IPL treatment often in combination with other treatments like microdermabrasion, chemical peels, and BOTOX to achieve desired results. A short visit to The Medispa is all you need to know what all a thin beam of laser can do for your skin. Waxing and shaving are a thing of the past as more and more women are opting for New Jersey laser hair removal. This treatment not only removes hair for good, but also does is quite painlessly so all you are left with is beautiful skin. More than unwanted hair, the tattoos we outgrow tend to annoy us. Name of an ex-flame tattooed with √©lan in the past can be source of embarrassment. Even the tattoo of skulls and swords you loved as teenager can be a nuisance now. Monmouth Laser Tattoo Removal at Medispa is the panacea for all your tattoo woes. Laser beam breaks up the coloured ink as it passes through the skin which is then disposed off naturally. Smart lipo Monmouth is another very effective cosmetic treatment offered at The Medispa. For a beautiful figure without sweating it out at the gym, smart lipo Shrewsbury is the ideal solution.
